text:
Mohamed  Elganiny
SUMMARY
10+ years of experience providing strategic advice to global oil and gas
clients throughout the life of their investments. An experienced Account
Manager with a proven track record of selling process technology license,
digital solutions, engineering services, equipment and catalysts to refining
and petrochemical companies.
SKILLS
Computer
• Industry 4.0/IIOT
• Process Simulation
• Proficient in Microsoft Office
Languages
• Arabic: Mother tongue
• English: Fluent
AWARDS
• Honeywell TopGun Award -
2020
• UOP Middle East Top
Achiever Award - 2018
• Granted a US patent relating to an Olefins process technology - 2018
• Honeywell Gold Award -Leadership Impact - 2017
• Honeywell Gold Award -Growth and Customer
WORK EXPERIENCE
2018 – present :- Sr. Account Manager – Lif Mohamed  Elganiny
SUMMARY
10+ years of experience providing strategic advice to global oil and gas
clients throughout the life of their investments. An experienced Account
Manager with a proven track record of selling process technology license,
digital solutions, engineering services, equipment and catalysts to refining

Achiever Award - 2018
• Granted a US patent relating to an Olefins process technology - 2018
• Honeywell Gold Award -Leadership Impact - 2017

WORK EXPERIENCE
2018 – present :- Sr. Account Manager – Lifecycle Solutions & Technologies
Honeywell UOP – Middle East
Managing the Middle East customer base (refining & petrochemicals process technologies, digital solutions, products and services).
Developed an understanding of the assigned customers, in particular with respect to their
business drivers, buying behaviours, and decision-making structures.
Developed and maintained relationships as necessary with key personnel within customer organizations and industry consulting groups.
Developed and delivered agreed to sales revenue and margin targets.
Organized and led internal proposal review and pricing/bid strategy meetings for mega refining & petrochemical projects.
Prepared project specific sales strategies for each event with close interaction with technical teams. Assisted in the lead role for negotiation and closure of sales which also included preparation and
finalization of commercial agreements necessary to close sales.
Forecasted sales revenues for customer accounts.
2015 – 2018 Technical Service Specialist II/Regional
Service Manager – Olefins Technology Services
Honeywell UOP – Middle East
Assisted existing UOP customers in Saudi Arabia, UAE, and China to achieve their goals through monitoring and troubleshooting of their petrochemical units.
Other accountabilities included providing technical support to new licensees during commissioning and startup of their units, assisting UOP Sales Support during technical discussions, providing process technology training to new licensees, and participating in technology
2012 – 2015 Chief Technical Advisor – Field Services
Honeywell UOP - Global
Worked on different UOP technologies in Asia, Africa and North America with a strong focus on propane dehydrogenation technology. Developed a strong understanding of the refining/petrochemical industries and process technology licensor’s business model.
Key accountabilities included providing field technical assistance during unit
checkout/startup/operation, knowledge transfer to UOP customers, and managing UOP Field
Services team on site.
2010 – 2012 Development Engineer – R&D
Honeywell UOP - USA
Worked mostly on development of UOP Ecofining™ process for green diesel production.
EDUCATION
2021 – 2023 Master of Business Administration
The University of Manchester
2005 – 2010 Bachelor of Chemical Engineering
Cairo University
3.2 GPA with degree of honor. Top five percent of my class. Top 10 ranked student in the last
academic year.
CERTIFICATIONS/COURSES
2011 Six Sigma Green Belt
Honeywell UOP
2018 Miller Heiman - Strategic Selling
2018 Process Technology - Value Selling

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
